name: 賀一平
objective:
本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、求職信等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes and application letters). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation; Business Letter Format and Style
Week 2: Application Letters
Week 3: Resumes
Week 4: Autobiography
Week 5: Statements of Purpose (Study Plan)
Week 6: Letters of Recommendation
Week 7: Letters of Complaint
Week 8: Letters of Apology
Week 9: Midterm Examination; Invitations
Week 10: Letters of Request and Letters of Response
Week 11: Letters of Congratulations and Appreciation
Week 12: Letters of Condolence and Sympathy
Week 13: Inquiries and Orders
Week 14: Writing a Memo
Week 15: Writing Email
Week 16: Writing a Business Report and Proposal
Week 17: Writing a Business Report and Proposal
Week 18: Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam: 20%
Final Exam: 20%
Attendance and Assignments: 60%
materials: Witte, M. (2016). Business Writing: Skills, Applications, and Practice (3rd Ed). Cosmos Culture
